properties.name: id
properties.doc: The identifier that will be assigned to the rendered HTML component.

properties.name: properties
properties.doc: Bound to a dictionary that contains additional properties for this element.

properties.name: class_name
properties.doc: List of CSS class names that will be associated with the generated HTML Element. This class names will be added to the default taipy-<element_type>.

properties.name: hover_text
properties.doc: Information that is displayed when the user hovers over this element.
